data.text: @OklahomaCovid @HealthyOklahoma Ahhh headed in the wrong direction again I see

@Habritainwrite1 @HealthyOklahoma They released the number after we posted this last night.

Oklahoma Daily COVID Case Numbers

Friday - 1113
Saturday - No Report
Sunday - No Report
Monday - No Report
TUESDAY - 1601

Total for the Pandemic - 1,026,072
@OklahomaCovid @HealthyOklahoma They say that they are not going to be releasing them anymore
@OklahomaCovid @HealthyOklahoma Because the war in Ukraine is the new hot topic.
@Sammysmom15 @OklahomaCovid @HealthyOklahoma As citizens of Oklahoma that pay your SALARIES….

@KIM510 @OklahomaCovid @HealthyOklahoma Agreed! The way our state has handled the pandemic has been horrible. So many lives could have been saved had things been more transparent. Thank God for our tribes!!❤️
@OklahomaCovid @HealthyOklahoma And if they don't report them, then the CDC cannot provide an updated risk category...and I continue to wear my mask.  Shtitt needs to be fired
@Sammysmom15 @OklahomaCovid @HealthyOklahoma They haven’t been reporting for months . It’s mostly been the tribes . We still have no Drs on the medical board for state dept of health! Insane

@OklahomaCovid @HealthyOklahoma @HealthyOklahoma Can you please do your job and release the numbers daily. As citizens of Oklahoma we have the right to know how our state is doing during a worldwide (deadly) pandemic. Plain and simple!!
@OklahomaCovid @HealthyOklahoma Oklahoma I thought was going to weekly numbers released on Thursdays.
